title: Chapter 155 The Hare and the Hound
content: A HOUND started a Hare from his lair, but after a long run, gave up the chase. A goat-herd seeing him stop, mocked him, saying “The little one is the best runner of the two.” The Hound replied, “You do not see the difference between us: I was only running for a dinner, but he for his life.”

book.title: 伊索寓言 Aesop's Fables
